sections.heading: Transfer of Powers and Duties of Department of Licensing and Regulatory Affairs Relative to the Licensing and Regulation of Child Caring Institutions, Child Placing Agencies, Foster Family Homes, Foster Family Group Homes, and Court-Operated Facilities Arising From the Child Care Organizations Act a
sections.text: Transfer of Powers and Duties of Department of Licensing and Regulatory Affairs Relative to the Licensing and Regulation of Child Caring Institutions, Child Placing Agencies, Foster Family Homes, Foster Family Group Homes, and Court-Operated Facilities Arising From the Child Care Organizations Act and the Social Welfare Act to the Department of Health and Human Services.
